page.title: 18HASELEY KNOB:THEN AND NOW-2
page.content: {WEATHER}Mrs.Daffern said that there used to be hotter summers and colder winters.During the summer the children would sit outside to get cool before going to bed.Only the rich used to go abroad for holidays. {FASHION}has greatly improved.Ladies' fashion is extremely varied with many colours and styles; men's fashion has changed less.Clothes are more hygienic, and make-up is popular. Ear- piercing is not new,but much cheaper. {HAIRSTYLES}are more outrageous now because of gel,mousse and spray.Any length of hair is fashionable, and so are brightly-coloured dyes. Hair can be curled or straight as you wish. {MEDICINE}We are now immunised against various serious diseases,which used to cause suffering - TB, polio.'Flu and scarlet fever were deadly.Hay-fever is still as bad as it used to be.
